definition: to help one another/to come to sb's help
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to help/to assist
We are most grateful for your valuable assistance.
see 路見不平，拔刀相助|路见不平，拔刀相助[lu4 jian4 bu4 ping2 , ba2 dao1 xiang1 zhu4]
to keep watch and defend one another (idiom, from Mencius); to join forces to defend against external aggressors/mutual help and protection
lit. to intervene when one sees an injustice (idiom)/fig. to rush to the rescue/to play the white knight
pinyin: lu4 jian4 bu4 ping2 , ba2 dao1 xiang1 zhu4

sentences.english: B： Don't worry. You will meet nice people that will help you.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，你会遇到贵人相助。

sentences.english: NO04,5. I don't know how to thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 你鼎力相助，我真不知该如何致谢才好。

sentences.english: We all appreciate your unstinting help.
sentences.chinese: 我们都感谢你不吝相助。

sentences.english: Life is great, especially when you have as many good people in your corner the way I do.
sentences.chinese: 生活是如此美好，特别是身边有那么多贵人相助。

sentences.english: But remember that return the favor when he or she needs your help.
sentences.chinese: 但记住他或她需要你帮忙时，你应该欣然相助。

sentences.english: Red is te symbol of effulgence and brilliance, which also need your help.
sentences.chinese: 红色是灿烂和辉煌的象征，但这也需要您的鼎力相助。

sentences.english: Handsome flying back to Shanghai, can be said to be met with the help of others.
sentences.chinese: 帅飘重回上海，可以说是遇到了贵人相助。

sentences.english: In troubled times, though, they mean that the EU struggles to act.
sentences.chinese: 在困难时期，则意味着欧盟在鼎力相助。

sentences.english: Wherever there is injustice, we try to help.
sentences.chinese: 凡有不公正的地方，我们都竭力相助匡正。

sentences.english: 'I don't need anybody else. I can do the whole thing by myself.'
sentences.chinese: 我不需要任何人相助，我自己就能搞定一切。

sentences.english: Hope to people can help, next is deeply grateful.
sentences.chinese: 望才之人能相助，在下感激不尽。

sentences.english: Because of a friend's help and encouragement, you will be invincible and indomitable.
sentences.chinese: 因为朋友的相助和激励，你才会战无不胜，一往无前。

sentences.english: DuSiMan in order to thank WuYanBin help, specially asked him to dine.
sentences.chinese: 杜思曼为了感谢吴彦斌相助，特地请他吃饭。

sentences.english: The two peoples have the tradition of helping and supporting each other.
sentences.chinese: 中智两国人民素有守望相助的传统。

sentences.english: Just then, nine door of your help.
sentences.chinese: 就在此时，九门的各位出手相助。

sentences.english: But the country's traditional donors have not stepped-in to help.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦的传统援助国尚未出手相助。

definition: to bless/to protect/protection (esp. divine)
asylum/shelter/to shield/to put under protection/to take under one's wing
assistance/a helping hand/to lend a hand
to lead by the hand/to guide/to support
to bless and protect/to protect
nobility/person of high rank
(honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
to rescue
can't thank sb enough (idiom)
misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
to point out/to indicate/to give directions/to show how (to do sth)/to censure/to pick at
chance/opportunity/destiny
great catastrophe
to help/to assist financially
were it not for/if not for
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert disaster
